content: this pattern is for a classic hot water bottle cosy knit in stocking stitch and finished with an elastic collar in rib - seamless - bottom up - in the round the pattern easily can be adjusted to any gauge as well as being knit top down or flat if needed slide the cover over the bottle at anytime to check and adjust the fit if necessary ____________________________ **pdfs** the pattern comes with directions for dk and aran weight **recipe** if the design requires accurate preparation please check out the recipe the recipe includes directions for any dimension and gauge ____________________________ **needles** long ciruclar needle magic loop lenght 80 cm/ 32 or matching set of double pointed needles **gauge** square of 10cm / 4 stocking stitch **dk** needle size - 4 mm/ 6 us gauge - 22 sts/ 32 row yardage - ~180 m/190 yds **aran** needle size - 5 mm/ 8 us gauge - 18 sts/ 26 row yardage ~180 m/190 yds
